text: “Eghtɨ atrivim gumazamizibar nguazitam me dama a inian kogham. A nguazir manam isɨ uan otaritam danɨngɨsɨ, a uan nguazimra isɨ a danɨngam. Eghtɨ nguazir kam an otarimɨn bizimra. A gumazamiziba abɨnɨva men nguaziba me dama da inian kogham. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, nan gumazamiziba uan nguazibar ikɨ deraghvɨra dapiagham. Me aghamsɨgh tintinibar nguazir igharazibar mangan kogham.”
